_header: For thing that is to asken
_description: Instructions in prayer — seven lines, probably monorime, possibly a translation of the Latin Pro debita circum… which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.First Lines:
For þing þat is to askyn [ ]With stedefast herte &
                    lesten [ ]…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…with good hope of fordingge [ ]In time þat is nouth to
                    chelen [ ]& þat man prey for himself ouer al [ ]Pro debita
                    circum [ ]
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 1.
